name: Learning Path: Data Visualization Examples

# Learning Path: Data Visualization Examples
---

## An Introduction to d3.js: From Scattered to Scatterplot, by Scott Murray
### To download example files from this video course, click [here](http://chimera.labs.oreilly.com/books/1230000000345/).

## Learning to Visualize Data with D3.js, by Rafael Hernandez
### To download example files from this video course, click [here](http://examples.oreilly.com/0636920036654/).

## Using Storytelling to Effectively Communicate Data, by Michael Freeman
### To download example files from this video course, click [here](http://examples.oreilly.com/0636920040064/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
